website_summaries.verdict: This is just a solid, fiberblass ladder that will last a lifetime; rope and pulley system makes raising and lowering a breeze.
pros: holds up to 300 pounds and feels very stable for even people that are heavy
cons: More expensive than competing fiberglass ladders

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it.
customer_reviews.text: So this seems like a nice ladder. However ordering on Amazon it came as a fiberglass cracked ladder with multiple pieces missing. It basically looked like Mike Tyson had this ladder in the ring up to round 8. This ladder may have been in better shape when it got delivered to my house if it was shot out of a scud missile launcher. And then ran over by a M1 Abrams. Other than that it was a good experience. I Refused to sign for it and sent it back where it will probably end up in a scrap yard. Even then the scrapyard may even refuse it and just send it to a landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Bozarth

customer_reviews.title: At Least One Unfortunate Experience
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the ladder because one of the two latches would not open, preventing the ladder from collapsing and making extension difficult, on the first use on the day of receipt. The problem was so bad that even after three men were able to wrestle it to the ground, we still had difficulty getting it to collapse. I hope that my experience was an exception, and I had no trouble returning the item, but it was my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Risher

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely bad quality
customer_reviews.text: It has really bad quality. It come with damages. I can’t use it because damages and can’t return it because the time limit was expired.
customer_reviews.author: Network System Administrator

customer_reviews.title: great delivery of a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I want to shout from the roof tops what an amazing company ABF trucking is!!! They delivered this ladder under difficult circumstances, the road was closed limiting access to my garage... the driver actually unloaded it and walked it down the street using a hand truck... Ladder is incredible, lightweight enough for this senior citizen to use but strong enough I don't have to be afraid cleaning the gutters... Amazon, ABF trucking and Louisville ladders you rock....
customer_reviews.author: M. Norman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ladder. We needed to buy a ladder to ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT ladder. We needed to buy a ladder to paint our house over the summer. We had priced ladders at all of the big box stores, but we didn't have a way to get a 28' ladder home without having it delivered. When looking online, other stores wanted $200 to deliver a similar ladder! We were so thankful for Amazon prime's free delivery charge with this ladder. The ladder itself is great. A little heavy, but fiberglass ladders will be. I felt safer on this ladder rather than the regular aluminum ladder we have.
customer_reviews.author: Mom23boys

customer_reviews.title: Everything you expect it to be and more, highly recommend this ladder for everything from around the house (outside) to at work
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality ladder arrived on-time as described. This ladder is well built, easy to use and very durable. Feet on bottom can be made to dig in to further stabilize the ladder when extended. Integrated pull rope allows easy extension while doubling as extra method to tie ladder off while extended. Locking clamps provide primary security in locking the ladder in once extended and have security clasps to further lock it in. Overall a well thought out, high quality product but then what would you expect from Louisville?
customer_reviews.author: EricTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: lot of confidence in the ladder
customer_reviews.text: The ladder seemed sturdy and well-built which gave me confidence to climb and do work at 18-ft; previously I'd been as high as 9-ft so being at 18-ft was a new, worrying experience. D-shaped rungs were an important feature in helping my confidence at climbing and working on the ladder. I'm happy about the free delivery that was part of the purchase; I don't own a truck and the big-box stores charged a delivery fee -- the delivery went well and I received a text message about 30-minutes before the delivery truck arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Julius D

customer_reviews.title: Beware of shipping damage.
customer_reviews.text: It shipped freight and it looked like it, had a few dents in it when I received it, one foot was hit hard enough to make it not usable, they did give me a discount to get a replacement foot. Beefy, sturdy ladder, I'm a big guy and needed a beefy ladder, only complaint about the ladder is its width between the steps, seems really narrow, 2-3 inch's wider would be better. It's a Louisville, will last you a lifetime, its an investment.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Ladder is not very heavy which is a good thing for moving it around by myself and yet ...
customer_reviews.text: Ladder is not very heavy which is a good thing for moving it around by myself and yet it feels very Sturdy while using it. I'm at about 260lbs so this is the one I needed for me.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyB

customer_reviews.title: Good Two-Story Ladder.
customer_reviews.text: My old ladder was rated for 200 lbs. I weigh 240. This ladder is rated for 300. Wonderful. The old ladder was 6 ft shorter and swayed in the wind. This 28 ft ladder is still. Steady. It is a little too heavy to comfortably carry by myself, but that's life! (I do carry it all by myself.) I'm happy with it and just need to rearrange the garage to store it. If you have a two-story house, you need to spend the money to get one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice ladder
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was really fast. I like everything about the ladder, except the extension locks, it looks like they are made of plastic instead of metal and that is the part that holds the extended ladder from collapsing. other than that, the ladder seems well built. I recommend the ladder and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: ACP

customer_reviews.title: Strong ladder, but still light enough to move around (for me, anyway) - like the rung "dogs"
customer_reviews.text: So, I tried to buy a 16' fiberglass ladder at 2 hardware stores in my town. They were very comparable to this ladder in terms of quality and purchase price. The difference? Amazon Prime DELIVERED this ladder. One hardware store just said "We Don't" (despite delivering Weber Grills all the time, including to our house!), The other wanted $30 to go about 2 miles. Aside from that, I am completely satisfied with the ladder. I'm not a small guy at about 230 lbs and this is rock solid. I'd add that I have no problem maneuvering it, and I'm 61 years old, but if someone was very slight or have physical strength issues???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 Steel plated swivel safety shoe broken
customer_reviews.text: Waited until the storms stopped then went to use the ladder on my next day off (have had it one week, garaged) and hoped to clean the gutters, discovered one of the "Steel plated swivel safety shoes" is broken. It won't move and possibly got damaged in shipping, not sure. Ladder is still usable with caution but I have spent too long looking for who to contact to get a replacement "shoe" to install. Please protect this product better during shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Single mom doing it all
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 20' ladder to clean leaves from the gutter of my one story house. The ladder is light enough to carry by myself, I can extend it, climb it, and put it away. What more do I need? (A devoted man would be nice :) )
customer_reviews.author: Someone in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was like climbing a ladder
customer_reviews.text: Never got to use it. When it was delivered it look like it was run over. I rejected the delivery
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, inspect for shipping damages.
customer_reviews.text: Product is well built minus they switch the latches to plastic instead of aluminum, shipping was horrible received busted up the first time and the second deep gouges, 40 labels affixed to it both shipping and from the manufacturer, and had written all over the side of it in permanent marker. Do yourself a favor go buy from Lowe’s or Home Depot where you can inspect the ladder, it will save you a lot of headache. Amazon was quick to resolve this he matter but doesn’t make it any less frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Brich342

customer_reviews.title: This is a good sturdy ladder that will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is really sturdy and well made. I feel safe climbing this ladder day in and day out. There is a safety latch that will prevent you from accidentally lowering it. Now, sturdiness does not come without a price. It is really heavy and it requires two people to maneuver, and lower it. Then again, I am not a big person.
customer_reviews.author: rocky purba

customer_reviews.title: Quality Ladder and 20' is a Nice Size
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice quality ladder. I have owned Werner's in the past but could not pass up the price + shipping of this Louisville as I live in a very rural area. Also, 20' is a nice size. It is reasonably light at 40lbs. and at age 64 I easily maneuvered it around my property doing various tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Dave from Maine

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladder
customer_reviews.text: I ladder was delivered without any packaging. So when it arrived it had multiple surface stratches from where it was moving around in the truck. Other then that the ladder works perfectly and is very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Djakarta L Parker

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT BEAT UP CONSIDERABLY !!!
customer_reviews.text: The ladder was scratched up and the rubber bumper tips beat up. Looks like it was dropped and miss handled pretty badly. If this is normal shipping routine, suggest different process. It looked like a used ladder when ithe arrived. Needed it to complete a project and had been anxiously awaiting it. So, signed for it. Greatly disappointed though. Will buy local next time and pay a little more and know what i'm getting.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Rash

customer_reviews.title: Good quality ladder
customer_reviews.text: This is what I would expect from a general-purpose extension ladder. Light weight, easy to use, good safety features. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rails2

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well designed and top notch materials went into this product. The rope hoist system to raise the ladder is better than the other more well known brand. A friend recommended this ladder to me and I could not be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tribulation ExodusTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy ladder
customer_reviews.text: The ladder arrived as scheduled and was very sturdy and easy to use. I actually need a taller ladder and I am ordering another one from Louisville Ladder. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: Louisville ladders are top of the line products, even the consumer models such as the one that I purchased. Light enough to be handled by one person but given the size you can always use some help. Very simple to use and the most important aspect is it is a sturdy and safe ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Pinlius

customer_reviews.title: Strong, easy to raise, get the wall bumper for the top.
customer_reviews.text: Every time ipick it up to move it I say to myself that I should have gotten the all aluminium one, but when I get to the 29 foot mark when using it I am glad I got this one. Great ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Orange County Ca.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, very sturdy, etc. For those of you like me who never owned a ladder over 16', you should know that this thing is very big and heavy. I really had a difficult time finding a good place to store it in my garage. But again, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: GPrev

customer_reviews.title: Solid but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Great ladder. little wobble even at the highest points. Put my Christmas lights up to the highest peaks this year. It was so secure that I even let my 16 year old son go all the way up and work it as well. The weight says 70lbs. It sure feels 20lbs heavier. 1 strong person can work it while collapsed, but if it is extended in any way, you will need 2.....just basic physics. Great price. I cost me what 1 season to install and take down would have cost me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy ladder
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the ladder to haul roof coating. The ladder is sturdy enough to hold the person and their load which was heavy. Provides more confidence in getting the job done safely.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Good ladder
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without a box and labels all over the ladder. Easy to use and be sure to read instructions on ladder. Simple to use and glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good strong ladder but heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Good strong ladder. Downside is that it is much too heavy for me to manage. Will donate it to someone in the family and get a lighter one.
customer_reviews.author: Victory

customer_reviews.title: Met Expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this ladder hoping to find a safe ladder that I could trust. The ladder met all my expectations. I feel comfortable using it to gain access to the roof and for pruning trees. It is heavy but that helps gain confidence in the ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned twice due to damage
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a nice ladder but we never got to use it. In damaged condition on both deliveries. Will be finding a different ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A.

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty ladder!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son. Came with heavy duty feet on the bottom and pads for the top. Cheap ladders don’t come with either!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hulzebos

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he loves them it’s sturdy and useful. He loves the variety of heights it reaches and ease of uses
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Speights

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY but well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Better have some muscle because it's heavy but it is very well constructed and easy to extend and lock.Well designed and rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Why Me.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality ladder,sturdy and safe
customer_reviews.text: Nice ladder and very sturdy for high jobs and climbing,great quality ladder,not super heavy,but does take meat on your bones to carry
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, 28 feet, to paint the house. When arrived one was damaged and after i requested an exchange they replaced it no problem. They were quick, polite, and did not question me. Great customer service and the ladders are nice too! Easy to use, on heavier side, but stable.
customer_reviews.author: Katie May

customer_reviews.title: PRE OWNED
customer_reviews.text: Amazon now sells pre-owned & visible used products now? Would give ZERO stars if possible- Ladder arrived bent, scuffed, and noticeably NOT brand new. Should send replacement FREE, regardless of an INCONVEINCED Return. Assume responsibility & potential Liability for shipping an already utilized and obviously pre-returned item. Shame on this Multi-billion dollar company
customer_reviews.author: C. De Torre

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder!
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about it. Lowe’s was a little cheaper but the shipping to my home was great and Lowe’s would taken two weeks long to get it to me!
customer_reviews.author: E. Claassen

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Ladder had a bad spring on the extension match and a dented rung as delivered. No box damage. The extension holds are plastic. Wish I had selected a Werner
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!  I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This Louisville ladder was a great purchase and delivered without any problems. It's a 20ft, so storage isn't so easy, but it allows me to work on just about anything around my house. I love this ladder.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Super stable and easy to move!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ladder for stability AND mobility. I feel safe and secure even when the ladder is fully extended. For a "heavy" duty ladder it is super light and easy to move. Louisville ladder is the way to go!! Delivered right to my front door in a matter of days. The big box hardware store guaranteed delivery within a month. REALLY? The choice was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Janes

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, my husband will be using most of the time but I wanted to climb it to see how sturdy it was, I felt very safe and I don't like heights! I would however like to buy the wider stabalizer add on only because I had a friend fall from a ladder and became a quadraplegic! You can NEVER be too safe!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: As an electrical contractor we don't need a 40' ladder often, but when we do I am glad I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mauder

customer_reviews.title: One of the best ladders I've ever owned (I'm 73).
customer_reviews.text: Well-built, sturdy, feels safe when on it; easy to operate; recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Long

customer_reviews.title: VERY HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: THIS LADDER IS VERY HEAVY! ONE MAN CANNOT USE THIS LADDER. TWO MEN HAVE A DIFFICULT TIME WITH THIS BEAST.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description and ladder used.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I thought it is 40lb ladder from description and misleading information. It looks the ladder is used because scratches everywhere and steps are dirty.
customer_reviews.author: jcalvinyu

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladder
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this ladder from Amazon and got it for a lower price than I could get it from my local big box home improvement store. It is a great sturdy ladder. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Judson M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Louisville ladder. I bought an eight foot step ladder a couple of years ago, and was impressed with the quality. This was another great purchase. Amazon delivery arrived right when they said they would, and the ladder was in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S G

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy ladder!
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is the right height for my needs! It was well wrapped in plastic wrap. It is very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: fourpugs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Extension Ladder
customer_reviews.text: Love this ladder, love it love it love it. I like that it has a locking tab so that when you are moving it around it doesn't shift at all, works great! Very sturdy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Martin

customer_reviews.title: Large cracks in fiberglass where rungs attach
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it would be a nice ladder if mine didn't arrive with large splits in the fiberglass where the rungs are attached. They are scheduled to pick it up and send a new one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Its heavy but its very good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice I would buy again if I needed it
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: It was a little pricey but the latter is very nice. Rugged and top quality
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Louisville Ladder
customer_reviews.text: It did everything I expected- it is very well made- sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ironland

customer_reviews.title: great ladder - feels stablehand solid at half way extension
customer_reviews.text: great ladder - feels stablehand solid at half way extension. full extension is a little wobbly but fine. Was surprised that it does in fact Includes a safety rope
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Safety and reliability Ia what i get!!
customer_reviews.text: Allow me to do things around the house from a height without being afraid.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney L.

customer_reviews.title: Scratched up and used
customer_reviews.text: For $350 this ladder is all scratched up and used. Ridiculous to arrive in this condition
customer_reviews.author: jvr

customer_reviews.title: It works very well
customer_reviews.text: Real good. Needs 2 people to move.but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: donald s green

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice ladder, little bit of a issue extending and lowering on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: spendy

customer_reviews.title: A really great ladder
customer_reviews.text: A really great ladder. Extremely sturdy yet light enough for the wife to carry. Truck delivery made it very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Great Customer Service! Was able to deliver the item to me sooner than expected. Awesome product, very sturdy. Easy to use, couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Abram Crozier

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality and HEAVY duty. I emphasize heavy because this ladder is not easy for one person to handle. Other than the weight, this ladder should last longer than I do.
customer_reviews.author: KD Know

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty is no joke.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty is no joke! This ladder is heavy even for being fiberglass. Very happy with the ladder.
customer_reviews.author: H. H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made ladder. This will last for a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Z.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this ladder for working around the house.. its sturdy doesn't wobble too much when fully extended...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly simple to use!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! Delivered and they put it up against the gutters so I could get them all cleaned out. So easy to use that this girl got the gutters all cleaned out with ease. So glad I got this!
customer_reviews.author: Tynessa Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Heavy ladder for sturdy jobs around the house and property.
customer_reviews.text: Nice ladder for around the house and property ....be aware...this is one heavy ladder! Much heavier than my other aluminum ladder......
customer_reviews.author: jcoyne

customer_reviews.title: heavier than you would think 40# would be
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy when you get it up but takes a lot of effort.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Well made ladder
customer_reviews.text: For homeowners, this is a safe and well made ladder. In the long run, I will save much money cleaning my own 2nd story windows. This ladder pays for itself after the first window cleaning. It is stable and quite well constructed. Most impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Cook & Collector

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty extension ladder.  Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I was deciding between an aluminum ladder and fiberglass. I'm glad I went with this fiberglass ladder. It is super heavy duty but is not too heavy to store or move around. I highly recommend this ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good Everyday Ladder
customer_reviews.text: It's 55 pounds, but can be lifted by one person when picked up in the middle. It feels steady when properly supported and will hold the 300 pound rating. The locking mechanism is a bit tricky, but secure once extended.
customer_reviews.author: Super64

customer_reviews.title: Probably could have been prevented with better packaging/cushioning materials
customer_reviews.text: The ladder was cracked when it arrived at the top, on the bend of the fiberglass. Probably could have been prevented with better packaging/cushioning materials. Also, the clips are plastic so I'll probably have to replace them before long. But for the price I paid, I guess I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: anna mabie

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Just one usage around my house likely paid ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy as you would think it is. Works fine. Just one usage around my house likely paid for it by not having to hire someone to do the work.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product. Even with prime took forever to arrive due to large size.
customer_reviews.author: QT

customer_reviews.title: Looks used when delivered
customer_reviews.text: Heavily scuffed when delivered, it look like a 5 year old well used ladder. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: I like the ladder
customer_reviews.text: I like the ladder. It's easy to adjust and seems it will last a long time. Just wish I would have paid more attention to the weight. Wouldn't think, with all that fiberglass, it would be so heavy.
customer_reviews.author: John Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best ladder that I've ever owned--and, I'm over 70..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and scrached
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with scratches and damages all over the body.
customer_reviews.author: Soroush

customer_reviews.title: It's a ladder
customer_reviews.text: It a great ladder other than the fact I can't use the excuse that something is to high to fix or clean. So if you enjoy Saturdays on a ladder with the Ole Lady pointing stuff out that needs to be done this is the ladder for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great big ladder for at home
customer_reviews.text: Big heavy duty ladder for personal use at home. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Beth

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is great
customer_reviews.text: The ladder is really perfect. It did have minor damage to one of the end caps which was missing. Not worth making anything of it though. Looked like there was no shipping protection at all. Delivery crew was on time and courteous.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Cain

customer_reviews.title: It came with the rope for extending the ladder. ...
customer_reviews.text: It came with the rope for extending the ladder. It's quite heavy. No instructions about how to use the safety shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Václav Novák

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: item was broken and crack, looked like it was used and had a lot of scratches and missing some spot
customer_reviews.author: Zubaidah

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is great for what we need to do for snow removal on back roof but will be kinda hard to manage in the snow..otherwise a very nice sturdy ladder
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i meed to do work around the house and it will last me a life time
customer_reviews.author: Archie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy ladder, but somewhat heavy. I was able to use it alone, but probably better for 2 men to manage
customer_reviews.author: alvinmc

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder. Poor delivery from amazon
customer_reviews.text: Great ladder and weight for the price. Only complaint is that it arrived cracked from amazon. No issue with the ladder, only the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Mike  Schwager

customer_reviews.title: Ladder
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy ladder, I feel very safe using it compared to my lightweight aluminum. The only issue is it's really heavy for one person to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy ladder
customer_reviews.text: I needed something this tall but it is a little hard for me to handle. I think most men could do so without a second thought. It will come in handy for changing bulbs in the shop. It seems to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: poco

customer_reviews.title: Solid  Well Built
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended especially over any aluminum ladder. It's light enough for one man set up but has a solid feel.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As described - perfect for what I need...those high lights in and outside the house. Delivered so very convenient
customer_reviews.author: Graham Kayes

customer_reviews.title: Ladder delivered with broken guide and scraped up with black grease like substance
customer_reviews.text: I refused the ladder delivery today due to it having broken parts with scrapes all over with a black grease like substance all over it.
customer_reviews.author: cheaper

customer_reviews.title: Ladder arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The ladder arrived today and it was was broken. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Don washington

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder
customer_reviews.text: This was a great replacement for the rickety wooden ladder that nearly killed me when I tried to clean my gutters. It feels very solid and is pretty easy to extend and retract. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cydney F.

customer_reviews.title: This ladder is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy to lug around, but not too bad for its size. Ruggedly built. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: JohnM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small ladder
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my son for a gift he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected, this ladder is SOLID! No need to worry about this one being an el cheapo, especially when you are 20' in the air. Very impressed! Took about 10 days for delivery, my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: The Hat Pros Brand Registry

customer_reviews.title: Nice ladder
customer_reviews.text: These Louisville’s seem to hold up much better than any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: sean riley

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered damaged. No one called back from customer service?? Fixed it myself...moving on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Louisville Ladder Fiberglass Extension Ladder, 28 feet, 300-pound duty rating, Type IA, FE3228,Orange
product_meta.description:
Size Name:28 FeetThis Louisville 28 ft. fiberglass extension ladder has a 300 lbs. load capacity, rated ANSI Type IA. It is equipped with the MAXLOCK rung lock, custom engineered from a patented, advanced molecular polymer, MAXLOCK is the strongest, toughest, lightest rung lock ever made. This ladder also includes the patented QuickLatch system that provides a simple, intuitive method of securing the fly and base sections of the ladder when extended. The ladder features outside slide guides, D-shaped rungs fully serrated for a slip resistant surface, non-marring rail end caps, rope and pulley and steel swivel safety shoes with metal shield to be used with the tread down or in spike position. The Louisville FE3228 fiberglass extension ladder meets or exceeds the safety standards set by ANSI, CSA and OSHA.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This 28-foot Louisville extension ladder has a load capacity of 300 pounds. It is great for working on electrical, utility, light construction and residential Jobs. It features D shaped rungs that are fully serrated for a slip resistant surface. It has mar-resistant rail end caps to protect landing surfaces and provide longer life. Louisville extension ladders include two extra heavy duty slide guides at the top of the base section combined with a stop on the fly section to prevent over extending the ladder. The heavy duty plated steel shoe with thick rubber treads makes this ladder safe and easy to use. It is one of many extension ladders in the Louisville line up.
feature_bullets: Dimensions - Extension Ladder Maximum Maximum Height (ft.): 25 | Storage Depth (in.): 7.25 | Storage Height (ft.): 14 |Product Weight: 60 lb
STURDY AND STRONG: With its 300-Pound capacity, elegant design and smooth finish, you won’t find a more durable, reliable ladder
FIBERGLASS is non-conductive when clean and dry
SAFE AND STABLE with Steel Swivel Safety Shoe with Metal Shield
GET COMFORTABLE with D-Shaped Rungs easier to stand on
PROTECT your landing surfaces with Mar-Resistant Rail End Caps
300 pound capacity including user and tool weight.Rope and pulley included
Meets or exceeds ANSI 14.4 and CSA grade1
